extendedInfo.description: Corps' Knowledge brings the USMC to your fingertips online and offline.  Corpsâ Knowledge leverages other apps to bring you a lightweight, multipurpose app with just the capabilities you need.  The level of integration that Corpsâ Knowledge offers is what makes it shine.  Just check it out and you will see.Designed for Marines past, present and future; Corpsâ Knowledge provides both basic and in depth looks into the Marine Corps. The USMC is the world's finest fighting force. If you are a part of it you need the market's finest Marine Corps app!We have been hard at work cranking out new features check them out! -PFT CalculatorCalculate your PFT,CFT and BMI. Use Corpsâ Knowledge during the PFT or CFT so you know what score you need for a first class-ALMAR+MARADMINGet up to the minute updates on the latest news released directly from the Marine Corps-MCI FoldersStudy MCIs on the go! Just upload the pdf file and you can bring all your MCIs with you. You can even search for the keywords to help you study-Find a RecruiterDo a search for the closest recruiter and contact him directly! USMC Knowledge will help you prepare during the entire process of joining. Use it to learn interesting facts, study before boot camp and after boot camp to stay sharp!-Acronyms-History-Weapons-General Orders-Articles of the UCMJ-Uniforms and ribbons placement sectionGet ready for future updates!-Ribbon Rack Tool-Ice Cream Sandwich features and integration-Composite Score Calculator-Updates are prioritized according to requests~anything you want we can make happen!

reviews.title: Great for Recruit study guide
reviews.comment: Its got most of the basic knowledge you need for the first few weeks in boot camp. SEMPER FI!!!
reviews.author: Josh Boyle

reviews.title: Add
reviews.comment: Should have more usmc knowledge. Other than that good stuff

reviews.title: Needs update!

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: Worst knowledge app ever not worth it and barely any info on it I recommend the infantry platoon app if your a grunt

reviews.title: Fix it, Marines.
reviews.comment: Some good material, but some of the stuff isn\'t even spelled correctly. Represent the Corps a little better.
reviews.author: Sherman Hovermale

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: This app is good. But it could be better. Instead of having the pft, cft, and bca calculators included in the app, it just sends you to the market to download them.

reviews.comment: It works, but doesn\'t have enough info to be useful.

reviews.title: Good idea, needs more development.
reviews.comment: Good idea, good knowledge to have.  However, I feel robbed. No built-in PFT/CFT/BMI/Cutting score calculator or MCI reader, and requires a supporting app for the PFT/CFT/BMI calculator. I have three other apps that do all but the cutting score, which is the exact reason I dl\'ed this app, and didn\'t get it. =/
reviews.author: A Google User
